reviewtext: Working with Nick is like being trapped in a never-ending nightmare. His code is so bad that it haunts my dreams! I wake up in a cold sweat, screaming at the thought of dealing with his mess again.
Olivia has no idea what she's doing, and it shows. Every line of code she writes is like a slap in the face to competent programmers everywhere. Avoid at all costs!

Our company hired Karen, who was reported for making inappropriate comments about coworkers' appearances. One example involved Karen making derogatory remarks about a colleague's outfit during a team-building event. Her behavior led to her termination and a renewed emphasis on maintaining a respectful workplace.
My initial impression of this programmer was not great, but they quickly turned things around. Their outstanding work made me a believer in their abilities.
